competitors.name: Veritas
competitors.notes: Major backup software vendor with NetBackup

competitors.name: EMC/Legato
competitors.notes: NetWorker backup software dominant in enterprise market

competitors.name: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager
competitors.notes: Enterprise backup and storage management solution

competitors.name: Computer Associates ARCserve
competitors.notes: Popular backup software for Windows and enterprise

context: In 2000, the backup and data protection market was dominated by traditional on-premises solutions. CommVault (founded 1996) was a relatively young company competing against established players. The market focused primarily on tape backup and disk-based backup systems.
